options.name: Brawler
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Unarmed Strikes and Melee Weapons.

options.name: Tough as Nails
options.description: Gain +3 maximum Health and +1 Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Reaction : Counter Strike
options.description: When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can immediately make an Unarmed Strike or Melee Weapon attack against them.

options.name: Fighting Spirit
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Unarmed Strikes and Melee Weapons. When you drop to 0 Health, you can choose to remain conscious at 1 Health once per day.

options.name: Action : Haymaker
options.description: Make an Unarmed Strike with a 1d4 Attack penalty. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and must make a Strength check or be pushed back 1 unit and become Prone.

options.name: Brutal Fighter
options.description: Your Critical Hit threshold with Unarmed Strikes and Melee Weapons is improved by 1, and Critical Hits deal an additional 1d6 damage.

options.name: Battle Hardened
options.description: Gain resistance to Pain and Fear effects. When you're reduced to half your maximum Health or lower, you gain +1 to all Attack and Damage rolls.

options.name: Action : Flurry of Blows
options.description: Make three Unarmed Strikes or two Melee Weapon attacks against one or more targets within your reach, each with a 1d4 Attack penalty.

options.name: Iron Fists
options.description: Your Unarmed Strikes count as adamantine weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage resistance. Gain +1d4 damage with Unarmed Strikes.

options.name: Master Brawler
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Unarmed Strikes and Melee Weapons. Once per turn when you hit with an Unarmed Strike or Melee Weapon, you can force the target to make a Strength check or be Stunned until the end of your next turn.
